donation.title: Unoffical Donate
donation.text1: Your donate is our power to keep run iM!
donation.text2: In recent year,iM is not to users donate,but after a year, the maintenance cost of iM is gradually increasing, in order to make the user experience better, this version has many optimizations, and future versions will continue to bring you a better experience. I hope you can give some support to make this community more robust!
donation.text3: You will be able to make your iM colorful in your donate!

creation.title: Statement of 2nd creation
creation.text1: Rayark사의 iM 시스템을 통해 만들 수 있는 권한을 제공하지만, 2차 창작이나 2차 생성에 대한 권한을 허용하지 않습니다.
creation.text2: iM System is produced by iM group,Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Taiwan (CC BY-NC-SA 3.0 TW)

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.text: We are a team of people who love Cytus2.
